styles.name: Arctic Expedition
styles.description: A chilly adventure in the frozen north
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should feature icy, blue letters with a polar bear and igloo in the background.
Use stark whites and icy blues, creating a cold arctic scene.

styles.name: Dragon's Lair
styles.description: Face fearsome dragons in their den
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should feature fiery letters with a dragon's claw and flames in the background.
Use fiery reds and oranges, set against a cave-like dark background.

styles.name: End Explorer
styles.description: Journey through the mysterious End dimension
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should have surreal, purple-tinged letters with an Ender Dragon silhouette in the background.
Use dark purples and blacks to evoke the mysterious End dimension.

styles.name: Haunted Hallows
styles.description: Spooky adventures in a ghostly realm
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should have eerie, ghostly letters with a haunted mansion and bare trees in the background.
Use muted grays and blues to convey a spooky, atmospheric environment.

styles.name: Magical Chest
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should have enchanting, sparkling letters with an open, glowing treasure chest in the background.
Use vibrant colors and mystical glows to emphasize a sense of wonder.

styles.name: Redstone Engineers
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should feature mechanical, circuit-like letters with a redstone torch and gears in the background.
Use bold reds and metallic greys, emphasizing technical and innovative themes.

styles.name: Battle Factions
styles.description: Join epic battles between rival groups
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should feature bold, warlike letters with crossed axes and a war banner behind the text.
Use dark, foreboding colors and a backdrop of a stormy battlefield.

styles.name: Dwarven Kingdom
styles.description: Explore vast underground cities and mines
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should have stout, stone-like letters with a dwarf helmet and crossed pickaxes in the background.
Use earthy tones like browns and grays, set against a backdrop of underground tunnels and caverns.

styles.name: Frozen Peaks
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should feature icy, crystal-like letters with a snowy mountain and ski tracks in the background.
Use cool blues and whites, creating a chilly, wintry scene.

styles.name: Jungle Expedition
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should have lush, green letters with a jungle vine and parrot in the background.
Use vibrant greens and a backdrop of dense, tropical foliage.

styles.name: Pirate Cove
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>.
The logo should have adventurous, pirate-themed letters with a ship's wheel and anchor in the background.
Use ocean blues and sandy browns, with a backdrop of a tropical island.

styles.name: Vanilla Survival
styles.prompt:
Design a Minecraft Server Logo.
The server is named: <server_name>
The logo should feature rugged, earth-toned letters with a simple wooden pickaxe and torch behind the text.
Use natural colors and a backdrop of an untamed wilderness.
